modName: Sararad Save Preset - Convert to a Follower
summary:
This is my first file uploaded to the nexus. For those of you who are here from my YouTube channel Kenerad, please read the long description below.

This is a save file/preset for those who know how to make followers with the creation kit.
It can also be used for those who just want an attractive character to play on.
descriptionHtml:
[b]<<<<<<<<<<<<THIS MOD IS DISCONTINUED, CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO VISIT THE CURRENT MOD PAGE>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67398/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67398/[/url]?

<< ALL CAPITAL LETTERS ARE EXETREMELY IMPORTANT DETAILS FOR THOSE WHO DONT KNOW >>


[/b]I do not know how to use the creation kit so all I ask is for those of you who do know how, to try to make a follower with this save preset (if possible)

(FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO CAME FROM MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL "Kenerad", I just want to say thanks for all the support you guys have been giving me. If you want to try the file out on your on "for non modding purposes just for fun" then read the "Required mods" section below.

(About Sararad - The Follower) (THIS IS WHAT I WOULD LIKE FOR HER TO BE AS A FOLLOWER "MODDERS READ THIS SECTION PLEASE")

- She is more of a spell sword/hunter who likes light armor and to be stealthy

- Her expertise is (archery - restoration - destruction - light armor - stealth - speach)

- (I prefer here to have a very pretty voice but If your not sure the voice is called - ("Female condescending" or "Young Eager Female"

- Her location I would prefer Riverwood as in my Lets Play Series we met there.

- She is a Nord, around 5' 8" and requires these mods for her to look like she does in the screen shots and the lets play series. (USE THE HAIR AND HAIR COLOR IN THE PRESET) (ALSO IF YOU FORGET WHAT HER EYE COLOR IS "ITS GREEN")(TRY NOT TO MESS WITH HER PRESETS TO MUCH, I STILL WANT HER TO LOOK THE SAME AS BEFORE IF NOT BETTER)


--- "REQUIRED MODS" for Sararad BY VERSION NUMBER(mods required to get the exact preset to look like my screenshots) (IM NOT SURE IF YOU DO NEED THEM  TO CREATE THE FOLLOWER, BUT FOR THE SAVE FILE I'M ASSUMING YOU WILL NEED THEM) ---

-- VERSION 1.0
- Brows
- SG hair pack
- ApachiiSkyHair
- Covereyes - eyes 1
- UNP female body (my preferred body for her)
- Pretty Face
- Pretty Face - UNP Neck Patch
- Racemenu
- The Eyes Of Beauty

--- (THIS POINT AND BELOW CAN BE CONSIDERED A "CHANGE LOG") ---

-- VERSION 1.1
- Brows
- SG hair pack
- Covereyes - eyes 1
- Racemenu
- The Eyes Of Beauty
- UNP Replacer Configuration Package (READ BELOW TO SEE WHAT TO CHOOSE TO GET THE EXACT PRESET)
- in the NMM installer window choose these options below only when installing the above mod  
- UNP Base Normal
- Fair Face Pretty Face
- UNP Delicate Body
- Fair Skin Shaved
- White Bikini (optional)


(OTHER FACIAL MODS LIKE "Adorable Faces" AND "Fair Skin Complexion" WILL CHANGE THE LOOK OF HER FACE SLIGHTY. ONLY USE ITHESE MODS F YOU CAN FIX HER FACE AND STILL MAKE HER LOOK THE SAME OR BETTER)
(In UNP Replacer Configuration Package, most of the mods like Pretty Face and UNP female body will be combined into this one installer for more ease "In my case it was CTD's")

--- I WOULD LIKE TO USE THIS FOLLOWER IN MY LETS PLAY SKYRIM SERIES ON YOUTUBE, SO IF YOU DO USE MY FILE AND MAKE ME A FOLLOWER I WILL GIVE YOU CREDIT IN MY VIDEOS (LOTS OF CREDIT) ---

- Thank you for checking the page, and file out if you did it. Like always have a fantastic day. =)
author: Kenerad
